game.title: The Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the Lost Temple of Eldarath
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a long-abandoned temple deep in the heart of the Whispering Woods, where the ancient Eldarians once worshiped their gods. The temple is said to contain a powerful artifact that could change the course of history. Your quest is to brave the treacherous journey, navigate the temple's deadly traps, and retrieve the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness-based attacks
game.quest-giver: Thorne Blackwood, a local scholar and historian

task.objective: Gather information about the Lost Temple of Eldarath from local villagers and travelers
task.description: Talk to the locals at the Silver Stag Inn, gather rumors and clues about the temple's location and layout
task.location: The Silver Stag Inn, Oakwood Village

task.objective: Navigate through the Whispering Woods to reach the temple entrance
task.description: Brave the treacherous woods, avoid deadly creatures and hazards, and find the hidden entrance to the temple

task.objective: Solve the ancient puzzle lock on the temple door
task.description: Examine the intricate carvings and symbols on the door, figure out the correct sequence to unlock it
task.location: The Lost Temple of Eldarath entrance
